title: Standard event wrapper for the Events API

token.title: A verification token to validate the event originated from Slack

team_id.title: The unique identifier of the workspace where the event occurred

api_app_id.title: The unique identifier your installed Slack application.
api_app_id.description: Use this to distinguish which app the event belongs to if you use multiple apps with the same Request URL.

event.title: The actual event, an object, that happened. You'll find the most variance in properties beneath this node.

type.title: The specific name of the event
Indicates which kind of event dispatch this is, usually `event_callback`

event_id.title: A unique identifier for this specific event, globally unique across all workspaces.

event_time.title: The epoch timestamp in seconds indicating when this event was dispatched.

authed_users.title: An array of string-based User IDs. Each member of the collection represents a user that has installed your application/bot and indicates the described event would be visible to those users.
